result.title: How to take input in this Problem in Google APAC Round A
result.content: Hello all.I was solving this problem https://code.google.com/codejam/contest/11274486/dashboard#s=p0 which needs to input vector of strings containing spaces. So i was using getline(cin,string_name) but could not take the input properly. I explained the issue properly here : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45903113/how-to-build-a-vector-of-strings-containing-spaces The first element in vector shows as a white space .Can anyone help me with this.Thanks.
